name: Hoopotheosis
description:
Legend says that the Chosen will pilgrimage to the mountain. They will accept the divine gift and, through their struggles, a new god will be born.

Born as a concept for Ludum Dare 47, with the theme "Stuck in a loop", the project was never submitted (because apparently I still don't know how to manage my time).

Now, after almost 8 months of on/off development, I was able to complete a little more polished version of the idea.

Enjoy.
